Box 18: Follow-up care of women with pre-eclampsia
/circle6 Advise the woman to come to you for a check-up twice a week regularly. 
/circle6 Monitor her blood pressure, her urine for the presence of proteins, and the foetal 
condition.
/circle6 Encourage her to take rest.
/circle6 Encourage her to take a normal diet. She should not be advise
